ValidationRule.description: This rule ensures that the catch up call notes are populated prior to moving beyond this stage.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
( ISPICKVAL(OW_status__c, "Await fact find") || ISPICKVAL(OW_status__c, "Provide advice") || ISPICKVAL(OW_status__c, "Complete") )
&&
ISCHANGED( OW_status__c )
&&
ISBLANK( OW_catch_up_call_notes__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please add catch up call notes before moving beyond the catch up stage.
